pairs.subject: Annual Performance Review Schedule
pairs.desc: Dear Employee, We are pleased to inform you that the annual performance review process will begin next month. Please find attached the schedule for your review. Make sure to prepare your self-assessment by the due date. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Best, HR Team.
pairs.explain: The email is from HR with a legitimate attachment regarding performance reviews.

pairs.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payroll Information
pairs.desc: Dear Employee, We need you to update your payroll information immediately to avoid any disruptions in your payments. Click the link below to access the update form. Thank you, Payroll Department.
pairs.explain: The email requests sensitive information and contains an executable attachment, which is a red flag.

pairs.subject: Quarterly Budget Review Meeting
pairs.desc: Hello Team, Please find attached the budget report for the upcoming quarterly review meeting. Review the document before our meeting next week. Let's ensure we are all prepared to discuss the key points. Regards, Finance Team.
pairs.explain: The email is from the finance department with a relevant attachment for a meeting.

pairs.subject: Your Invoice is Ready
pairs.desc: Dear Employee, Your latest invoice is ready for download. Please find the attachment and make sure to review it as soon as possible. Failure to do so may result in late fees. Regards, Billing Department.
pairs.explain: The email includes an executable attachment disguised as an invoice, which is suspicious.

pairs.subject: IT Security Awareness Training
pairs.desc: Dear Team, As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance security awareness, we are conducting a training session next month. Attached is the training material for your review. Please read through it before the session. Best, Security Team.
pairs.explain: The email promotes a training session with a legitimate PDF attachment.

pairs.subject: Important: Verify Your Account Now
pairs.desc: Dear User, We have detected unusual activity on your account. To secure your information, please verify your account by downloading the attached form. Thank you, Support Team.
pairs.explain: The email creates urgency and includes a malicious executable attachment.

pairs.subject: Facilities Maintenance Update
pairs.desc: Hello Everyone, We have scheduled maintenance for several facilities next week. Attached is the maintenance schedule. Please plan accordingly and let us know if you have any questions. Regards, Facilities Team.
pairs.explain: The email provides information about maintenance with a relevant attachment.

pairs.subject: Action Required: Confirm Your Details
pairs.desc: Dear Employee, We need you to confirm your personal details to keep our records up to date. Please download the attached document and follow the instructions. Thank you, Admin.
pairs.explain: The email requests personal information and has a suspicious executable attachment.

pairs.subject: Travel Policy Update
pairs.desc: Dear Team, We have updated our travel policy to better accommodate our employees. Please find the updated policy attached for your review. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Best, Travel Department.
pairs.explain: The email contains a legitimate attachment regarding company policy.

pairs.subject: Claim Your Bonus Now!
pairs.desc: Dear Employee, Congratulations! You have been selected for a bonus. Claim it by downloading the attached form and submitting it immediately. Regards, HR Team.
pairs.explain: The email promises a bonus and includes a harmful executable attachment.
